title: New​
content: </> RjacModule:New( ProfileInfo: table-- The data which will be overwrite the default properties of the class. ) → RjacProfile-- Returns the RjacProfile which has been created according to the provided ProfileInfo Constructor for RjacProfile

title: Character​
content: </> RjacProfile.Character: Model  A Model controlled by the Player that contains a Humanoid, body parts, scripts and other objects.

title: Configurations​
content: </> RjacProfile.Configurations: table Configurations for rotating, joint offsets, multipliers.

title: Enabled​
content: </> RjacProfile.Enabled: bool Determines whether body parts will be rotated.

title: Player​
content: </> RjacProfile.Player: Player  Player/owner of the RjacProfile.

title: TiltDirection​
content: </> RjacProfile.TiltDirection: Vector3  Angle according to which the body parts are to be rotated.

title: AddBodyJoint​
content: </> RjacProfile:AddBodyJoint( BodyPart: string,-- Name of the body part. BodyJoint: string,-- Name of the body joint. MultiplierVector: Vector3 -- Multiplier by which the joint will be multiplied in rotations. ) → () Add body joint to the list of joints which are to be rotated.

title: Initiate​
content: </> RjacProfile:Initiate() → () Starter function to assemble the whole profile for functionality

title: onCharacterAdded​
content: </> RjacProfile:onCharacterAdded( Character: Model -- A Model controlled by the Player that contains a Humanoid, body parts, scripts and other objects. ) → () Function ran when a new character is added for the player

title: RemoveBodyJoint​
content: </> RjacProfile:RemoveBodyJoint( BodyPart: string,-- Name of the body part. BodyJoint: string-- Name of the body joint. ) → () Remove body joint from the list of joints which are to be rotated.

title: UpdateBodyJointMultiplierVector​
content: </> RjacProfile:UpdateBodyJointMultiplierVector( BodyPart: string,-- Name of the body part. BodyJoint: string,-- Name of the body joint. MultiplierVector: Vector3 -- Multiplier by which the joint will be multiplied in rotations. ) → () Update body multiplier vector configuration.

title: UpdateBodyJointOffset​
content: </> RjacProfile:UpdateBodyJointOffset( BodyPart: string,-- Name of the body part. BodyJoint: string,-- Name of the body joint. JointOffset: CFrame -- Offset by which the joint will be rotated. ) → () Update body joint offset configuration.

title: UpdateCharacter​
content: </> RjacProfile:UpdateCharacter() → () Rotate the body joints of the character once.

title: UpdateTiltDirection​
content: </> RjacProfile:UpdateTiltDirection( CameraCFrame: CFrame -- CFrame of the Player camera. ) → () Update tilt direction which affects the rotation of body parts.
